name: condition-circle
description: Checks CircleCI environment before publishing successful build using semantic-release

scripts.size: t="$(npm pack .)"; wc -c "${t}"; tar tvf "${t}"; rm "${t}";
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.test-self: CIRCLECI=true CIRCLE_BRANCH=master DEBUG=condition npm_config_loglevel=verbose npm run semantic-release

author: Gleb Bahmutov <gleb.bahmutov@gmail.com>
